head.citation-title: Multivariate approximation: Theory and applications. An overview
head.abstracts: The fourth conference on "Multivariate Approximation: Theory and Applications" was held April 26 to May 01, 2007 at Cancun, Mexico. This introductory paper describes the main topics in Approximation Theory presented during this conference, ranging from theoretical aspects to numerous applications. © 2008 Springer Science+Business Media, LLC.

organization.$: Université de Valenciennes et du Hainaut Cambrésis
